alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 09 at 3:53AM MST until November 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Las Animas County, Kiowa County, Bent County, Prowers County and Baca county. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will have the potential to blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust will also occur causing significant reductions to visibility in places.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County; Western Kiowa County
